tool_description: This API is used to scrap a website. Fetch all the links, images & titles present in any website
name: FetchSiteInfo
title: FetchSiteInfo

api_list.name: getSitelinks
api_list.description: This will fetch all the links present in any website as Array of links
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://fetchsiteinfo.p.rapidapi.com/getSitelinks/www.thehindu.com"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "fetchsiteinfo.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://fetchsiteinfo.p.rapidapi.com/getSitelinks/{website}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "fetchsiteinfo.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: getSiteImages
api_list.description: This will fetch all the images present in any website as Array of links for images
api_list.code:

print(response.json())

api_list.name: getSiteTitles
api_list.description: If the website has titles (example, news titles present in a website). This API fetches all the titles present in any website. the output will be array of titles.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://fetchsiteinfo.p.rapidapi.com/getSiteTitles/www.thehindu.com"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "fetchsiteinfo.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
